text:
dap 具体的深；deeply 抽象的深，深深地；deeply moved，deep deep.

47. aloud, loud  
aloud 大声地；loud 大声地，read aloud（出声地读）

48. worth, worthy  
二者均为值得，worth 值得 doing，worthy 值得 be done.

49. catch a cold, have a cold  
catch a cold 不能和表示“一段时间”的状态连用，而catch a cold 可以。  
She has have a cold for a week.

50. change for, change into  
change for 指换成，change into 变成。  
Change the shirt for a bigger one. Women changes into ice.

51. continue, last  
二者均为持续，continue 主动，被动均可，last 只能用主动。  
The war continued / lasted five years. The story is to be continued.

52. food, raise  
food 喂养，养活，饲养（to give food to）：raise 饲养，养育（cause to grow，bring up children）raise the family.

53. go for a doctor, go to a doctor  
go for a doctor 去医生，go to a doctor 去看病。

54. notice, observe, catch sight of  
notice 注意到；observe 观察，仔细地看；catch sight of 突然看到，observe the stars.

55. insist on, stick to  
insist on 坚持要求，坚持接 doing；stick to 坚持，后常接 sth.  
Stick to the plan.

56. look, seem, appear
